    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/mnh/roo/6106666910.html"></div>
        </div>
Hello Room Searchers<br>
<br>
I have a room available June 1st for a yearlong lease in East Harlem for $1,300 a month.<br>
<br>
Details on the Building:<br>
The apartment is on the 10th floor of a 12 floor building. Have no fear, it is an elevator building and in the one year that I have been living here, there was only a span of one hour where the elevators did not work. There is laundry room on the 12th floor that is priced $6 for a wash and dry. The building has roof access with some pretty great views. There is a garbage shoot and a recycling room on each floor. There is a doorman at night and all day on the weekends (James, who is the absolute best) and an onsite super during the weekdays. The building has a central fire alarm and sprinklers. Residents tend to be young professionals or young families. The building is right between the 125th 4/5/6 subway and the 120th 6 subway. The Metro North stop is about an 8 minute walk. I work by the Empire State Building and it takes a little under 30mins door to door to give you an idea of commute time.<br>
<br>
Details on the apartment:<br>
The apartment is a true two bedroom. The bedrooms are the exact same size, just mirror images of each other. The bathroom is a good size. There is a hall storage closet that we share. The living room and kitchen are an open floor plan. There is a balcony facing south. Utilities wise, we are responsible for cable and electricity. Currently, the cable bill runs around $75 each. We are currently paying for some premium sport channels, but I am open to editing the package. Electricity is less than $30 each for most of the year. We do not pay for heating. During the three months of summer, the bill does dramatically spike because of AC usage. <br>
<br>
Details on the room:<br>
The room is about 10X12. The true gems of the room are the window and the closet. The window faces east and the sunrises are amazing (but if you aren't up with the sun, blackout curtains work great). Under the window is a spot for a wall AC. The closet is a double closet. So much storage. The pictures included in this post are of my room. The bed is a queen to give you some idea of the size. I also think you can tell a lot about someone by their room. Analyze away.<br>
<br>
Details on me:<br>
I guess if you have made it this far, I should introduce myself. My name is Kaitlyn and by the time you move in, I will have reached the middle of the 20s. I do IT work for an energy brokerage company. I travel a lot, normally at least once a month. I am obsessed with soccer (hence the sports package). I have a cat named Taylor who will live with us. She stays locked in my room when I am work, but I do open my door when I am home to let her run around a little bit. She a fat asthmatic cat with half a tail who needs all the exercise she can get. She is in the apartment with the leasing company's permission. I clean the litter box, housed in my room, multiple times a week. She goes on vacations to my parent's home when I am away, so don't worry about me asking you to look after her. Cleaning wise, I like to think of myself as clean. I go for the clean but lived in kinda apartment look. I'd also like to call myself a considerate and good roommate (but let's be real, who wouldn't say that.)<br>
<br>
Details on you:<br>
Gender does not matter.<br>
Looking for a roommate around the same ageish.<br>
Must make at least $52,000 (40x the rent)<br>
Okay with my cat. <br>
No drugs<br>
Non smoker<br>
No intention to murder me in my sleep (or at all preferably)<br>
<br>
Due on signing is first month rent and a deposit of 1,300 to be paid to my current roommate.<br>
<br>
If you read through all of that and are still interested, reply with some form of social media and your favorite book, sports team, or travel location. Please also tell me a little bit about yourself and let me know any questions that you may have.<br>
<br>
Happy hunting!<br>
    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

    <div class="postinginfos">

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">
   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-06-01" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available jun 1</span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">
           <span>no laundry on site</span><br>
           <span>no parking</span><br>
           <span>no private bath</span><br>
           <span>private room</span><br>
   </p>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/brk/roo/6106552159.html"></div>
        </div>
$925/month for semi-furnished bedroom in Clinton Hill, Brooklyn. Available June 1. Prefer 1 year commitment, but that is potentially flexible. First and last months' rent is required. Includes: electricity, gas, water, and high speed internet.<br>
<br>
Apartment is only 0.1 mile to the C train at Clinton-Washington and 0.3 miles to the G Clinton-Washington stop. Only 0.7 miles to Atlantic-Barclays (B, Q, 2, 3, 4, 5, LIRR). Grocery, laundry/cleaners, post office, coffee shops, bars, and restaurants a stone's throw away.<br>
<br>
Bedroom has an a/c unit, closet, and window. This is a huge well-furnished 3-bedroom apartment with hardwood floors, separate living, dining, and kitchen, which we share. All three bedrooms are spread throughout the apartment with common areas in between.<br>
<br>
This is a share with two quiet, clean, respectful professionals - a 20 something-year-old male professional and a 30 something-year-old female teacher. <br>
<br>
Seeking a young professional person who is clean, kind, responsible, and respectful in their use of common spaces. You know, someone who doesn't turn the TV up after 10pm, spend an hour taking a shower in the morning, throw surprise ragers in the apartment when we have to work the next day, or act like they expect a maid to show up. Cleanliness is very important to us. Ideally, you would also be enjoyable to be around!<br>
<br>
No pets. No drugs or smoking of any sort inside the apartment. No practicing of musical instruments (building rules).    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

               </p>

<script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0]; // dangerous assumption
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if ( fmt === 'regular' || fmt === 'mobile' ) {
            pagemode = fmt;
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
        } else {
            pagemode = 'regular';
        }
        pagemode = pagemode === 'mobile' ? 'mobile' : 'desktop';
        bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        if (C('hidesearch') === '1' && pagemode !== 'mobile') {
            bodyClassList.push('hide-search');
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof window.sectionBase !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(window.sectionBase + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1] || window.defaultView;
            if (mode) {
                bodyClassList.push(mode);
            }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//cnj.craigslist.org/roo/6106815141.html"></div>
        </div>
I'm a 27 year old female who is currently renting a wonderful 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment in Hamilton.  My roommate is leaving in May when the lease ends, and I am looking for a new roommate to sign a new lease wth me starting June 1st.  The apartment has a washer and dryer, we each have our own bathroom, and we have a community pool.  Very safe neighborhood and close to stores and restaurants.  Please let me know as soon as possible.  Looking for a roommate who is close in age.    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

<h2 class="postingtitle">
    <span class="icon icon-star" role="button">
        <span class="screen-reader-text">favorite this post</span>
    </span>
    <span class="postingtitletext">
<span class="price">$1100</span> <span id="titletextonly">Roommate wanted! AWESOME LOCATION! June 1st</span><small> (Grove Street)</small>        <span class="js-only banish-unbanish">
  <span class="banish" role="button">
    <span class="icon icon-trash" aria-hidden="true"></span>
    <span class="screen-reader-text">hide this posting</span>
  </span>
  <span class="unbanish" role="button">
    <span class="icon icon-trash red" aria-hidden="true"></span>
    unhide
  </span>
</span>
    </span>
</h2>
<section class="userbody">
    

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">
   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-06-01" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available jun 1</span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">
           <span>w/d in unit</span><br>
           <span>no private bath</span><br>
           <span>private room</span><br>
   </p>
    </div>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newjersey.craigslist.org/roo/6107263224.html"></div>
        </div>
Hi! My roommate and I are looking for a 3rd roommate in our 3-bed/2-bath apartment, less than a 3 minute walk to the Grove Street Path! *It does come with 1-month broker fee, which is already paid for and you will just have to pay us back.*<br>
The apt is spacious, updated bathroom and kitchen, dishwasher, and decent sized bedrooms (can easily fit queen or full size) with additional small furniture. W/D in unit.<br>
<br>
My roommate and I are both young female professionals that work a regular 9-5 in the city. We keep it pretty low-key on the weekdays and like to be out and about on the weekends. We are both financially responsible (always paid rent on time), clean, and very easy going, drama-free as roommates. We are looking for someone that is similar in terms of a roommate!<br>
<br>
Rent is $1,100 for the room, female roommates preferred. We are somewhat open to couples but this can be discussed further and will probably charge a bit more than what it currently is.<br>
<br>
Any questions, please let me know and I look forward to hear from you :)    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

    <div class="postinginfos">
            <p class="postinginfo">post id: 6107263224</p>

<h2>* Central Harlem** West Harlem** Upper West Side** Washington Heights** Morningside**Harlem** Williamsburg** Manhattanville** Upper East Side** Bushwick** Bedstuy** Morningside Heights** Central Park North** Hamilton Heights** Inwood** East Harlem** Central Park*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Central Harlem** West Harlem** Upper West Side** Washington Heights** Morningside**Harlem** Williamsburg** Manhattanville** Upper East Side** Bushwick** Bedstuy** Morningside Heights** Central Park North** Hamilton Heights** Inwood** East Harlem** Central Park*</h2><hr>    </section>

<span class="price">$1200</span> <span class="housing">/ 1000ft<sup>2</sup> - </span><span id="titletextonly">Couple w/ dog looking for couple to share a 2-3 bedroom house</span>        <span class="js-only banish-unbanish">

<section class="userbody">
    

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">
   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span><b>1000</b>ft<sup>2</sup></span>
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-06-01" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available jun 1</span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">
           <span>cats are OK - purrr</span><br>
           <span>dogs are OK - wooof</span><br>
           <span>w/d in unit</span><br>
           <span>off-street parking</span><br>
           <span>private bath</span><br>
           <span>private room</span><br>
   </p>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newjersey.craigslist.org/roo/6107461363.html"></div>
        </div>
My boyfriend and I are in the process of moving, we have one month to find a new place. Move in date: June, 1 2017. We would love to rent a house with a yard for our half pitt/ half rottweiler, sweetheart of a dog, King. We haven't committed to any houses yet but are trying to go in on a 2-3 bedroom house with another couple to save money. Rent and utilities would be split in half between couples.  Your pets would be welcomed as well. The house will be in Essex/Passaic county due to work. If you are interested, please contact us to discuss in further detail.<br>
<br>
    </section>

            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>

    </ul>
</footer>
    </section>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/que/roo/6107620220.html"></div>
        </div>
3 working professional women in our 20's looking for a fourth roommate to join us in our fully furnished home.  <br>
<br>
Large eat in kitchen, 2 living rooms, foyer space for shoes and coats. <br>
<br>
Your room: Large bedroom (unfurnished) with AC unit, hardwood floors, & closet on 2nd floor in our 4BD, 2 bathroom house.  Able to fit a queen sized bed and a couple dressers/tables/desk. Cable hookup available. <br>
<br>
Your roommates: We are neat, clean, and respectful women looking for the same in a roommate! Two Physician Assistants and one Pharmacy student in her 5th of 6 years of school. <br>
<br>
Easy street parking, no laundry on site. <br>
<br>
Asking $850 all utilities and cable/wifi included. $625 security deposit. Lease is month to month. FYI - we have a cat. <br>
<br>
Please contact Jillian (
 <a href="/fb/nyc/roo/6107620220" class="showcontact" title="click to show contact info" rel="nofollow">show contact info</a>
)<br>
<br>
Available June 1    </section>

<h1>* Central Harlem** Washington Heights** Bedstuy** Central Park** Inwood** Bushwick** Morningside Heights** Upper East Side** Williamsburg** Central Park North** Hamilton Heights** West Harlem** East Harlem** Manhattanville**Harlem** Morningside** Upper West Side*</h1><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h1>* Central Harlem** Washington Heights** Bedstuy** Central Park** Inwood** Bushwick** Morningside Heights** Upper East Side** Williamsburg** Central Park North** Hamilton Heights** West Harlem** East Harlem** Manhattanville**Harlem** Morningside** Upper West Side*</h1><hr>    </section>

                <span class="bestof-icon">&hearts; </span><span class="bestof-text">best of</span>
              </a> <sup>[<a href="https://www.craigslist.org/about/best-of-craigslist">?</a>]</sup>
        </p>
        
    </div>

    <div class="print-information print-pics"></div>

</section>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/mnh/roo/6107603429.html"></div>
        </div>
<h3>* Upper West Side** Bushwick** Upper East Side** East Harlem** Manhattanville** Morningside Heights** Williamsburg**Harlem** Washington Heights** Hamilton Heights** Bedstuy** West Harlem** Morningside** Inwood** Central Park North** Central Harlem** Central Park*</h3><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h3>* Upper West Side** Bushwick** Upper East Side** East Harlem** Manhattanville** Morningside Heights** Williamsburg**Harlem** Washington Heights** Hamilton Heights** Bedstuy** West Harlem** Morningside** Inwood** Central Park North** Central Harlem** Central Park*</h3><hr>    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

   </p>

           <span>w/d in unit</span><br>

<h2>* Central Park North** Upper West Side** Upper East Side** Washington Heights** Morningside Heights** Bushwick**Harlem** Williamsburg** Bedstuy** Inwood** West Harlem** Manhattanville** Hamilton Heights** Central Park** Morningside** East Harlem** Central Harlem*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Central Park North** Upper West Side** Upper East Side** Washington Heights** Morningside Heights** Bushwick**Harlem** Williamsburg** Bedstuy** Inwood** West Harlem** Manhattanville** Hamilton Heights** Central Park** Morningside** East Harlem** Central Harlem*</h2><hr>    </section>

<h3>* Bushwick** Central Park North** Morningside** Washington Heights** East Harlem** Manhattanville** Central Park** Upper West Side** Morningside Heights** Inwood** Upper East Side**Harlem** West Harlem** Williamsburg** Bedstuy** Hamilton Heights** Central Harlem*</h3><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
3 bedrooms total <br>
<br>
1x$1050<br>
1x$1100<br>
1x$1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h3>* Bushwick** Central Park North** Morningside** Washington Heights** East Harlem** Manhattanville** Central Park** Upper West Side** Morningside Heights** Inwood** Upper East Side**Harlem** West Harlem** Williamsburg** Bedstuy** Hamilton Heights** Central Harlem*</h3><hr>    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

<h2>* Bedstuy** Upper East Side** East Harlem** Central Harlem** Williamsburg** Morningside Heights** Bushwick** Central Park** Morningside** Manhattanville** Central Park North** West Harlem** Upper West Side** Washington Heights** Hamilton Heights**Harlem** Inwood*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1000<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Bedstuy** Upper East Side** East Harlem** Central Harlem** Williamsburg** Morningside Heights** Bushwick** Central Park** Morningside** Manhattanville** Central Park North** West Harlem** Upper West Side** Washington Heights** Hamilton Heights**Harlem** Inwood*</h2><hr>    </section>

<div class="psa-box">
</div>

<h2>* Upper East Side** Bedstuy**Harlem** Bushwick** Central Park** Williamsburg** Central Harlem** Central Park North** Upper West Side** Hamilton Heights** Morningside** Morningside Heights** Washington Heights** Inwood** West Harlem** East Harlem** Manhattanville*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Upper East Side** Bedstuy**Harlem** Bushwick** Central Park** Williamsburg** Central Harlem** Central Park North** Upper West Side** Hamilton Heights** Morningside** Morningside Heights** Washington Heights** Inwood** West Harlem** East Harlem** Manhattanville*</h2><hr>    </section>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>

<h1>* Central Park** West Harlem**Harlem** Bedstuy** Morningside Heights** Upper East Side** Bushwick** Central Harlem** Inwood** Washington Heights** East Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Williamsburg** Morningside** Manhattanville** Upper West Side** Central Park North*</h1><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
3 bedrooms total <br>
<br>
1 x $1050<br>
1 x $1100<br>
1 x $1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h1>* Central Park** West Harlem**Harlem** Bedstuy** Morningside Heights** Upper East Side** Bushwick** Central Harlem** Inwood** Washington Heights** East Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Williamsburg** Morningside** Manhattanville** Upper West Side** Central Park North*</h1><hr>    </section>

        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">

<h1>* Manhattanville** Central Harlem** West Harlem** Williamsburg** Morningside** Central Park North** Bushwick**Harlem** Morningside Heights** Inwood** Upper East Side** Hamilton Heights** East Harlem** Upper West Side** Bedstuy** Central Park** Washington Heights*</h1><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1000<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h1>* Manhattanville** Central Harlem** West Harlem** Williamsburg** Morningside** Central Park North** Bushwick**Harlem** Morningside Heights** Inwood** Upper East Side** Hamilton Heights** East Harlem** Upper West Side** Bedstuy** Central Park** Washington Heights*</h1><hr>    </section>

<script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0]; // dangerous assumption
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if ( fmt === 'regular' || fmt === 'mobile' ) {
            pagemode = fmt;
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
        } else {
            pagemode = 'regular';
        }
        pagemode = pagemode === 'mobile' ? 'mobile' : 'desktop';
        bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        if (C('hidesearch') === '1' && pagemode !== 'mobile') {
            bodyClassList.push('hide-search');
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof window.sectionBase !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(window.sectionBase + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1] || window.defaultView;
            if (mode) {
                bodyClassList.push(mode);
            }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

Going to Montauk for the Summer and I need some one to take over my room wile I'm gone. I'll be gone till about November.<br>
<br>
-Ideal candidate would work in the film industry and be very clean. <br>
-Three other guys that are my good friends live in the apartment.<br>
- 420 Friendly.<br>
- Utilities/ WiFi Included.<br>
-Temper-Pedic Gel bed. <br>
-Two blocks from the A train Utica stop. <br>
-First three months up front. <br>
-Email for more info.    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

<h1>* Inwood** Central Park** Morningside Heights** West Harlem** Upper East Side** East Harlem** Manhattanville** Central Park North** Morningside** Williamsburg** Washington Heights** Bedstuy** Central Harlem** Bushwick** Hamilton Heights** Upper West Side**Harlem*</h1><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
3 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h1>* Inwood** Central Park** Morningside Heights** West Harlem** Upper East Side** East Harlem** Manhattanville** Central Park North** Morningside** Williamsburg** Washington Heights** Bedstuy** Central Harlem** Bushwick** Hamilton Heights** Upper West Side**Harlem*</h1><hr>    </section>

<h2>* Central Park North** Inwood** Morningside** Manhattanville** Williamsburg** Central Park** Bedstuy** Upper West Side** West Harlem**Harlem** Bushwick** Washington Heights** Hamilton Heights** Central Harlem** Morningside Heights** East Harlem** Upper East Side*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1000<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Central Park North** Inwood** Morningside** Manhattanville** Williamsburg** Central Park** Bedstuy** Upper West Side** West Harlem**Harlem** Bushwick** Washington Heights** Hamilton Heights** Central Harlem** Morningside Heights** East Harlem** Upper East Side*</h2><hr>    </section>

<h1>* Upper West Side** Inwood** Central Park** Morningside** Manhattanville** Upper East Side** East Harlem** Bedstuy**Harlem** Morningside Heights** West Harlem** Central Park North** Bushwick** Hamilton Heights** Williamsburg** Washington Heights** Central Harlem*</h1><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1000<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h1>* Upper West Side** Inwood** Central Park** Morningside** Manhattanville** Upper East Side** East Harlem** Bedstuy**Harlem** Morningside Heights** West Harlem** Central Park North** Bushwick** Hamilton Heights** Williamsburg** Washington Heights** Central Harlem*</h1><hr>    </section>

    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0]; // dangerous assumption
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if ( fmt === 'regular' || fmt === 'mobile' ) {
            pagemode = fmt;
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
        } else {
            pagemode = 'regular';
        }
        pagemode = pagemode === 'mobile' ? 'mobile' : 'desktop';
        bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        if (C('hidesearch') === '1' && pagemode !== 'mobile') {
            bodyClassList.push('hide-search');
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof window.sectionBase !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(window.sectionBase + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1] || window.defaultView;
            if (mode) {
                bodyClassList.push(mode);
            }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/brk/roo/6107673696.html"></div>
        </div>
Beautiful, cozy sun-filled room in a 3 bedroom/1 bathroom apartment in Bushwick. The apartments renovated prior to our move in and features new furnishings, dishwasher, and washer/dryer in the basement. The neighborhood is young and fun, steps from the JMZ at Myrtle/Broadway and a 10 minute walk to the L train at Morgan Avenue. Great restaurants, coffee shops and grocery nearby too! Two roommates one in early 30s, and one in early 20s both very laid-back and hardly ever home.<br>
<br>
Please view more photos and also you can reach out to me here<br>
https://www.leasebreak.com/short-term-rental-details/16425/73-jefferson-streetlbc    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

    <span class="icon icon-star" role="button">

    <span class="postingtitletext">
<span class="price">$550</span> <span class="housing">/ 430ft<sup>2</sup> - </span><span id="titletextonly">Summer Sublet (June thru August): Journal Square 17 Min. to Manhattan</span><small> (Journal Square)</small>        <span class="js-only banish-unbanish">

</figure>

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">
   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span><b>0BR</b> / <b>1Ba</b></span>
             <span><b>430</b>ft<sup>2</sup></span>
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-05-30" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available may 30</span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">
           <span>furnished</span><br>
           <span>house</span><br>
           <span>private bath</span><br>
           <span>private room</span><br>
   </p>
    </div>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/jsy/sub/6107739515.html"></div>
        </div>
A studio type furnished apartment is available for June, July, and August. It is on the ground floor (semi-basement) of a two story house. The apartment has private kitchen, private small bathroom, walk-in closet, and has a door to the backyard.<br>
<br>
A 5 minute-walk away from Journal Square station of PATH Train. It takes 17 minutes to 14th Street/6th Avenue and 21 minutes to 33rd Street/6th Avenue in Manhattan. Neighborhood is safe. Grocery stores, supermarkets, laundry, post offices, etc. are all within short walking distance. <br>
<br>
I am looking for someone who is mature, reliable, cares about keeping the space clean, and who can stay for the entire period (June through August). The person ideally must be no taller than 5'5 (167 cm) for the ceiling is lower than usual.<br>
<br>
$550 per month including utilities and internet, plus $700 security deposit. Apartment does not have AC but the temperature is usually comfortable. Upfront payment might be required in case source of income or solvency is not proved.<br>
<br>
Thank you very much.    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

    <span class="postingtitletext">

        </div>

<h2>* Williamsburg** East Harlem** Upper East Side** Bedstuy** Central Park North** Hamilton Heights** Manhattanville** Inwood** Central Park** Morningside Heights** Upper West Side** Morningside**Harlem** Central Harlem** West Harlem** Washington Heights** Bushwick*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Williamsburg** East Harlem** Upper East Side** Bedstuy** Central Park North** Hamilton Heights** Manhattanville** Inwood** Central Park** Morningside Heights** Upper West Side** Morningside**Harlem** Central Harlem** West Harlem** Washington Heights** Bushwick*</h2><hr>    </section>

<h2>* Morningside Heights** Williamsburg** Upper East Side**Harlem** Bushwick** Manhattanville** Washington Heights** Morningside** Bedstuy** East Harlem** West Harlem** Inwood** Upper West Side** Central Harlem** Central Park North** Hamilton Heights** Central Park*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Morningside Heights** Williamsburg** Upper East Side**Harlem** Bushwick** Manhattanville** Washington Heights** Morningside** Bedstuy** East Harlem** West Harlem** Inwood** Upper West Side** Central Harlem** Central Park North** Hamilton Heights** Central Park*</h2><hr>    </section>

<h2 class="postingtitle">

<h2>* East Harlem** Central Park North** Inwood** Hamilton Heights** Bushwick** Morningside Heights** Washington Heights** Morningside** Williamsburg** West Harlem** Central Harlem** Manhattanville**Harlem** Central Park** Upper East Side** Upper West Side** Bedstuy*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* East Harlem** Central Park North** Inwood** Hamilton Heights** Bushwick** Morningside Heights** Washington Heights** Morningside** Williamsburg** West Harlem** Central Harlem** Manhattanville**Harlem** Central Park** Upper East Side** Upper West Side** Bedstuy*</h2><hr>    </section>

             <span><b>340</b>ft<sup>2</sup></span>
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-06-01" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available jun 1</span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">
           <span>no laundry on site</span><br>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/mnh/roo/6107921299.html"></div>
        </div>
This is a one year minimum with lease agreement and <br>
good local references  required.  Must be nonsmoker.<br>
<br>
Share with 2 other professionals.  Has fireplace and 2  7 foot windows<br>
with guard  gates  and high ceilings. About l7 by    16  feet.<br>
Semi furnished can provide single bed . Air conditioner available.<br>
<br>
$1200   plus one third Electricity.<br>
<br>
Shared payment of Internet.   By appointment. Send who you are<br>
and tel number too. Great midtown location  2nd Floor walk up.<br>
No living room but sdhared kitchen and bathroom    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/que/fee/6108103896.html"></div>
        </div>
Hi guys,<br>
I have a 3 Bedroom, 1.5 Bathroom 1000 sq.ft. apartment on the 3rd floor of a 3 floor walk up. Tenants have to have good credit and work references. We require 1 month rent for security, 1 month rent in advance, 1 month rent for commission. The cross street is 29th Ave and 162nd St in North Flushing/Whitestone. This is renting at a $500-700 discount so don't miss out!!<br>
<br>
Edmund (917) 805-1404    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
        <li>Fee Disclosure:Credit Check</li>
</ul>

<h2>* Bushwick** Central Park North** Morningside Heights** Williamsburg** Morningside** Inwood** Washington Heights** Bedstuy** Central Harlem**Harlem** East Harlem** Manhattanville** Central Park** Upper East Side** Hamilton Heights** Upper West Side** West Harlem*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
3 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Bushwick** Central Park North** Morningside Heights** Williamsburg** Morningside** Inwood** Washington Heights** Bedstuy** Central Harlem**Harlem** East Harlem** Manhattanville** Central Park** Upper East Side** Hamilton Heights** Upper West Side** West Harlem*</h2><hr>    </section>

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">
   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span><b>2BR</b> / <b>1Ba</b></span>
             <span><b>800</b>ft<sup>2</sup></span>
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-07-30" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available jul 30</span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">
           <span>furnished</span><br>
           <span>apartment</span><br>
           <span>laundry in bldg</span><br>
           <span>no smoking</span><br>
           <span>private bath</span><br>
           <span>private room</span><br>
   </p>
    </div>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/mnh/sub/6108319455.html"></div>
        </div>
We are subletting our spacious, new construction apartment for part of August. Let me know what dates you are looking for, and we can work together to find a mutually beneficial arrangement. Price is $250/night or $1600 for one week. <br>
<br>
This is a perfect apartment for a family of 3 or 4. Master bedroom has a queen size bed. Other bedroom has a twin with trundle bed. The second bedroom is our 6 year old daughter's so there are lots of books, tapes and cds, plus toys and other fun children's activities. Please note: We have a cat (which we will board while away) so this is not good for those with pet allergies. Also there is a construction site across the street. They work between 7am - 5pm daily. If you are out and about, you won't notice it. This would not be a good place for a quiet retreat (nothing in Hell's Kitchen would be!), but is perfect for a family home base from which to explore the city. At night, it is peaceful enough.<br>
<br>
We are located in Hell's Kitchen a block from the beautiful West Side Greenway that runs along the Hudson. Just down the block is the Manhattan Kayaking Club. Free kayaking is available near 51st Street on weekends. The Intrepid Museum is nearby. We are a short trip on the bus or subway away from Central Park. We have two adult bikes and a child's bike and scooter, if you are interested. You can also rent these nearby at Al's Cycles on 10th Ave.<br>
<br>
Serious inquiries only. I will need at least two references.<br>
<br>
Thanks.    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/wch/roo/6108347056.html"></div>
        </div>
Charming apartment building conveniently located in a beautiful quiet neighborhood. Just a 15 minute walk to Metro North train station, bus, downtown restaurants, and shops. A large unfurnished room with two large windows and french doors.  Heat &amp; Hot water included. Split utilities. Looking for long term, 1 year lease. 1 month security deposit. Credit and reference check required.    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

    <span class="icon icon-star" role="button">

    <span class="postingtitletext">
<span class="price">$1200</span> <span class="housing">/ 4br - </span><span id="titletextonly">Sublet Available June 1st-Aug. 2nd near Columbia University</span><small> (Harlem / Morningside)</small>        <span class="js-only banish-unbanish">

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">
   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span><b>4BR</b> / <b>1Ba</b></span>
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-06-01" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available jun 1</span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">
           <span>furnished</span><br>
           <span>apartment</span><br>
           <span>no laundry on site</span><br>
           <span>no smoking</span><br>
           <span>no parking</span><br>
           <span>no private bath</span><br>
           <span>private room</span><br>
   </p>
    </div>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/mnh/sub/6108565406.html"></div>
        </div>
We are three female roommates with various summer travel plans, looking for a subletter for a room in our apartment near Columbia University for the period from approx. June 1st-Aug. 2nd  (we can discuss specific move-in and out dates).<br>
<br>
The room is $1,200 per month, all utilities and wifi included. We will also keep the toilet paper/hand soap, and paper towels stocked over the sublease term.<br>
<br>
 The people who usually live here are: <br>
<br>
Female, 30, writer/editor/writing instructor <br>
<br>
 Female, 27, grad student at Columbia in Modern Art (curatorial studies) <br>
<br>
 Female, 22, undergraduate student in home products at FIT.<br>
<br>
The 30 yr old will definitely be around all summer, and the other two will be in and out.<br>
<br>
The room has a lot of natural light and is furnished with a bed, dresser, desk, lamp,<br>
 etc... <br>
<br>
The vibe in our place is relaxed, laid back, kind and respectful, you should be too! We do have some basic rules about keeping the common spaces clean after use, and have a weekly rotating chore wheel for taking out trash and recycles and keeping the bathroom and kitchen tidy. We're busy folks working on our stuff, but we like to enjoy each other's company from time to time as well. The kitchen is yours to use, and cookware is shared. There is no laundry in the building.<br>
<br>
 Our building is a 10-minute walk from the main Columbia campus,<br>
 and near the 1 train at 125th st, and A/C/B/D lines.<br>
 We're also close to MSM, UTS, and JTS, and many nice<br>
 restaurants and parks are nearby. The area is very safe--our<br>
 block has 24-hour security guards.<br>
<br>
 Please tell us something about yourself in your response.<br>
 Looking forward to hearing from you! Vegetarians/vegans/LGBTQ very welcome<br>
<br>
    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

               </p>
        <p class="postinginfo">
              <a class="bestof-link" data-flag="9" href="https://post.craigslist.org/flag?flagCode=9&amp;postingID=6108565406" title="nominate for best-of-CL">
                <span class="bestof-icon">&hearts; </span><span class="bestof-text">best of</span>
              </a> <sup>[<a href="https://www.craigslist.org/about/best-of-craigslist">?</a>]</sup>
        </p>

<script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0]; // dangerous assumption
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if ( fmt === 'regular' || fmt === 'mobile' ) {
            pagemode = fmt;
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
        } else {
            pagemode = 'regular';
        }
        pagemode = pagemode === 'mobile' ? 'mobile' : 'desktop';
        bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        if (C('hidesearch') === '1' && pagemode !== 'mobile') {
            bodyClassList.push('hide-search');
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof window.sectionBase !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(window.sectionBase + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1] || window.defaultView;
            if (mode) {
                bodyClassList.push(mode);
            }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">
   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-06-01" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available jun 1</span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">
           <span>laundry on site</span><br>
           <span>street parking</span><br>
           <span>no private bath</span><br>
           <span>private room</span><br>
   </p>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/brk/roo/6108563427.html"></div>
        </div>
This post is for a downstairs room in a large 3 Bdrm 1st Floor/Basement apt. Located off the Lorimer stop of the J, M and L. The place is spacious, quiet, and there's cat. We also have walk up roof access. In addition to being big, it's very convenient, which is why I have been here for 10 years. Love the neighborhood too, very close to a lot of bars and restaurants on Grand, but it's also a quiet block.<br>
Non smokers preferred, since it's a no smoking apartment.<br>
All 3 BR's are 11'x22' w/ window(though not much of a view), unfurnished. Fully furnished K&B, w/Large common area. Utilities (g&e, heat/water, hi-speed net,<br>
cable TV(HBO, Showtime, Cinemax, cable box in the room if wanted). All is included in the $1200/mo rent. Security is required before move in, also $1200. Currently 2 professional males, both with day schedules. Will ask to provide references.<br>
Seeking someone cool, laid back and clean(clean up after yourself, put everything away, etc.)for possible long term, starting June 1st. No dogs, but would consider someone with no more than one cat.<br>
Thanks    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">
   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-06-01" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available jun 1</span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">
           <span>laundry in bldg</span><br>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/mnh/roo/6108681302.html"></div>
        </div>
Looking for a female roommate to move into an open room in a 3BR apartment in the heart of Hell's Kitchen! (No pets, sorry!)<br>
Room Details <br>
- Available June 1st <br>
- Year long lease (can be flexible if needed)<br>
- Sunny, queen-sized private bedroom<br>
- Closet, two windows, and air-conditioning <br>
- $1,400/month (+ utilities and security deposit)<br>
Apartment Details: <br>
- Huge kitchen/living space - fully furnished<br>
- Dishwasher<br>
- Full kitchen<br>
- Heat/water included<br>
- Monthly bills ~$50/person<br>
- You'd be living with me and one other girl- both in our mid 20s, advertising and marketing professionals <br>
- Clean<br>
Building Details:<br>
- 49th &amp; 8th Ave<br>
- Elevator/doorman building <br>
- Steps away from ACE, 1, NQR, and 7 train, Columbus Circle, HK restaurants/nightlife<br>
- Laundry in basement    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">

             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-06-01" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available jun 1</span>

           <span>no laundry on site</span><br>
           <span>no private bath</span><br>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/mnh/roo/6108774711.html"></div>
        </div>
Hello all, <br>
<br>
I am currently subletting an apartment in the UES and I am looking for someone to sign onto the lease with me to renew it on June 1st and file the application by May 5th! Its on 73rd and York. The apartment is simple, the rent is stupid good, your room would be the biggest, and the neighborhood is lovely. <br>
<br>
A little about your would be roommates and who we'd like you to be: We're all in our early 20s trying to make it. Watch enough Netflix to be classified as an addiction. Respect each others privacy,  like quiet, respect Beyonce as our savior, and want our home to be a calm place. We'd like you to be the same as well. Especially about the Beyonce part. If you fit the bill, please reach out ASAP so we can show you the place. Thanks! <br>
<br>
*You will need to have a guarantor with good credit ready to go. Also some personal references. Serious inquiries only as we have a short deadline.    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

<h2 class="postingtitle">
    <span class="icon icon-star" role="button">
        <span class="screen-reader-text">favorite this post</span>
    </span>
    <span class="postingtitletext">
<span class="price">$680</span> <span id="titletextonly">Female Roommate Wanted</span>        <span class="js-only banish-unbanish">
  <span class="banish" role="button">
    <span class="icon icon-trash" aria-hidden="true"></span>

</h2>
<section class="userbody">
    

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">
   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-09-01" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available sep 1</span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">
           <span>w/d in unit</span><br>
           <span>off-street parking</span><br>
           <span>no private bath</span><br>
           <span>private room</span><br>
   </p>
    </div>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/fct/roo/6108920614.html"></div>
        </div>
Hi, my name is Lauren. I am a 22 year old at Sacred Heart University. I am a rising senior and am looking for a roommate as my current one is looking to move out and I would like to renew my lease. I live in a great apartment in a very safe area of fairfield. My apartment is a year old - kitchen, 2 bedrooms, office and tv room. Large deck that overlooks property. Very close to downtown fairfield and seconds away from Black Rock Turnpike. 10 minute drive to both Sacred Heart and Fairfield University campuses. I do have a dog that lives with me. She is 2 years old and is SUPER friendly - so you must like dogs. I am pretty easy going and would like someone that has previous history of living with a roommate. I love being outdoors and spending time with my dog. Washer and dryer provided. Large driveway that fits 3 cars. Street parking with no parking restrictions - never been an issue with parking. Lease starts Sept 1st    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

    <div class="postinginfos">
            <p class="postinginfo">post id: 6108920614</p>

               </p>
        <p class="postinginfo">
              <a class="bestof-link" data-flag="9" href="https://post.craigslist.org/flag?flagCode=9&amp;postingID=6108920614" title="nominate for best-of-CL">

<script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0]; // dangerous assumption
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if ( fmt === 'regular' || fmt === 'mobile' ) {
            pagemode = fmt;
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
        } else {
            pagemode = 'regular';
        }
        pagemode = pagemode === 'mobile' ? 'mobile' : 'desktop';
        bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        if (C('hidesearch') === '1' && pagemode !== 'mobile') {
            bodyClassList.push('hide-search');
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof window.sectionBase !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(window.sectionBase + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1] || window.defaultView;
            if (mode) {
                bodyClassList.push(mode);
            }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

Large room for rent in Large House:  Gourmet kitchen, Internet, Cable, Washer Dryer, Air Conditioned, Heat and utilities included.<br>
Renovated bath shared with one neat room mate. Enormous shared space in decorator home.<br>
<br>
Great location with NO DRAMA respectful and considerate roommates near NYC buses, Willowbrook Mall, Upper Montclair .<br>
<br>
References, 1 month deposit.  Previous tenant references also available to you.<br>
<br>
Pictures by request.<br>
<br>
    </section>

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">

             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-06-01"

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/que/roo/6109630643.html"></div>
        </div>
Large bedroom available in beautiful, spacious apartment in Astoria! A three<br>
Minute walk to the N/W Astoria Blvd stop. <br>
<br>
Apartment:<br>
-big kitchen w granite countertops<br>
-open layout <br>
-bright and sunny<br>
-3rd story walk up<br>
-very safe neighborhood<br>
-roomy and home-y :)<br>
-landlord occupied building<br>
<br>
Roommates:<br>
-fun, chill;  not crazy partners but we have fun, watch movies, cook, yadda yadda <br>
-responsible, respectful, clean<br>
<br>
You :)  :<br>
-nonsmoking<br>
-no big parties back at the house<br>
-no couples or pets<br>
-responsible, respectful, clean, excellent sense of humor a plus :)<br>
-ability to sign 1 year lease<br>
-awesome :)<br>
<br>
Apartment is Surrounded with lots of great bars, restaurants, shops. Laundry one block away. Looking for a responsible, respectful roommate to sign the lease starting June 1st. Your room would be the largest and has a private bathroom with shower. <br>
<br>
Roommates are two young professional women, one mid-twenties (works in marketing/tech/higher ed), one mid-thirties (actress/nanny extraordinaire).  We are very laid-back and fun, chill and looking for a great fit!<br>
<br>
Comment or PM! We are doing interviews this weekend!!!! :)    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

<h2 class="postingtitle">
    <span class="icon icon-star" role="button">
        <span class="screen-reader-text">favorite this post</span>
    </span>
    <span class="postingtitletext">
<span class="price">$730</span> <span class="housing">/ 140ft<sup>2</sup> - </span><span id="titletextonly">Room for rent in Kew Gardens</span>        <span class="js-only banish-unbanish">
  <span class="banish" role="button">
    <span class="icon icon-trash" aria-hidden="true"></span>
    <span class="screen-reader-text">hide this posting</span>
  </span>
  <span class="unbanish" role="button">
    <span class="icon icon-trash red" aria-hidden="true"></span>
    unhide
  </span>
</span>
    </span>
</h2>
<section class="userbody">
    

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">
   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span><b>140</b>ft<sup>2</sup></span>
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-06-01" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available jun 1</span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">
           <span>no smoking</span><br>
           <span>street parking</span><br>
           <span>no private bath</span><br>
           <span>private room</span><br>
   </p>
    </div>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/que/roo/6110046877.html"></div>
        </div>
One 10x14ft room for rent in four bedroom apartment. Private house, quiet Kew Gardens neighborhood, second floor. <br>
Shared kitchen and bathroom with other three male tenants. Other tenants do not have any pets, are non-smokers, all are grown ups (meaning no partying at home, no loud music, etc.) and keep the place neat.<br>
5 minutes walk to J & Z trains and Q10 & Q54 buses, 10 minutes walk to LIRR, 15 minutes walk to E and F trains. <br>
Shopping, small restaurants, diners, movie theater within walking distance. <br>
<br>
Rent is $730 per month. Utilities are extra, shared with other tenants (usually around $50/month each).<br>
We have high speed FIOS internet, can get an additional cable box as well.<br>
No middle man, one month's security deposit only.<br>
On weekdays please call after 7pm or text/email me any other time.<br>
Available June 1st<br>
Semi furnished.<br>
At least one housing/rental reference required.    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

    </section>

<h3>* Central Park North** Morningside Heights** Bedstuy** Morningside** Washington Heights**Harlem** Manhattanville** Central Park** Bushwick** East Harlem** Inwood** West Harlem** Upper West Side** Central Harlem** Upper East Side** Hamilton Heights** Williamsburg*</h3><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h3>* Central Park North** Morningside Heights** Bedstuy** Morningside** Washington Heights**Harlem** Manhattanville** Central Park** Bushwick** East Harlem** Inwood** West Harlem** Upper West Side** Central Harlem** Upper East Side** Hamilton Heights** Williamsburg*</h3><hr>    </section>

              <a class="bestof-link" data-flag="9" href="https://post.craigslist.org/flag?flagCode=9&amp;postingID=6110172943" title="nominate for best-of-CL">
                <span class="bestof-icon">&hearts; </span><span class="bestof-text">best of</span>
              </a> <sup>[<a href="https://www.craigslist.org/about/best-of-craigslist">?</a>]</sup>
        </p>
        
    </div>

    <div class="print-information print-pics"></div>

</section>

<div class="psa-box">

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/mnh/roo/6110158007.html"></div>
