<h3>* Manhattanville** Upper West Side** Central Park** Williamsburg** Hamilton Heights** Bushwick** East Harlem** Central Harlem** Morningside** West Harlem** Morningside Heights** Central Park North** Bedstuy** Washington Heights**Harlem** Upper East Side** Inwood*</h3><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h3>* Manhattanville** Upper West Side** Central Park** Williamsburg** Hamilton Heights** Bushwick** East Harlem** Central Harlem** Morningside** West Harlem** Morningside Heights** Central Park North** Bedstuy** Washington Heights**Harlem** Upper East Side** Inwood*</h3><hr>    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

<h2>* Central Park** Manhattanville** Williamsburg** Hamilton Heights** Inwood** Bedstuy** Central Harlem** Upper East Side** Morningside Heights** Morningside** East Harlem** Bushwick** Washington Heights**Harlem** Upper West Side** Central Park North** West Harlem*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Central Park** Manhattanville** Williamsburg** Hamilton Heights** Inwood** Bedstuy** Central Harlem** Upper East Side** Morningside Heights** Morningside** East Harlem** Bushwick** Washington Heights**Harlem** Upper West Side** Central Park North** West Harlem*</h2><hr>    </section>

            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>

<h2>* Williamsburg** Hamilton Heights** Central Park** Washington Heights**Harlem** West Harlem** Inwood** Central Harlem** Bedstuy** Bushwick** Upper West Side** Morningside Heights** Upper East Side** East Harlem** Morningside** Central Park North** Manhattanville*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Williamsburg** Hamilton Heights** Central Park** Washington Heights**Harlem** West Harlem** Inwood** Central Harlem** Bedstuy** Bushwick** Upper West Side** Morningside Heights** Upper East Side** East Harlem** Morningside** Central Park North** Manhattanville*</h2><hr>    </section>

<h2>* Washington Heights** Bushwick** Manhattanville** Morningside** East Harlem** Upper West Side** Hamilton Heights** Central Park North**Harlem** Bedstuy** Central Harlem** Upper East Side** Williamsburg** Central Park** West Harlem** Inwood** Morningside Heights*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
3 bedrooms total <br>
<br>
1 x $1050<br>
1 x $1100<br>
1 x $1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Washington Heights** Bushwick** Manhattanville** Morningside** East Harlem** Upper West Side** Hamilton Heights** Central Park North**Harlem** Bedstuy** Central Harlem** Upper East Side** Williamsburg** Central Park** West Harlem** Inwood** Morningside Heights*</h2><hr>    </section>

<h3>* Bedstuy** East Harlem** Upper West Side** Inwood** Central Park** Williamsburg** Central Park North** West Harlem** Upper East Side** Morningside Heights**Harlem** Central Harlem** Bushwick** Hamilton Heights** Morningside** Manhattanville** Washington Heights*</h3><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
3 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h3>* Bedstuy** East Harlem** Upper West Side** Inwood** Central Park** Williamsburg** Central Park North** West Harlem** Upper East Side** Morningside Heights**Harlem** Central Harlem** Bushwick** Hamilton Heights** Morningside** Manhattanville** Washington Heights*</h3><hr>    </section>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>

<h3>* Morningside Heights** Bedstuy** West Harlem** Central Harlem**Harlem** Manhattanville** Inwood** Upper East Side** Morningside** Central Park North** Upper West Side** Hamilton Heights** Washington Heights** East Harlem** Bushwick** Central Park** Williamsburg*</h3><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1000<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h3>* Morningside Heights** Bedstuy** West Harlem** Central Harlem**Harlem** Manhattanville** Inwood** Upper East Side** Morningside** Central Park North** Upper West Side** Hamilton Heights** Washington Heights** East Harlem** Bushwick** Central Park** Williamsburg*</h3><hr>    </section>

<h3>* Morningside** Morningside Heights** Central Harlem** Washington Heights** West Harlem** Bushwick** Inwood** Hamilton Heights** Bedstuy** East Harlem** Upper East Side** Williamsburg** Manhattanville** Central Park** Central Park North**Harlem** Upper West Side*</h3><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h3>* Morningside** Morningside Heights** Central Harlem** Washington Heights** West Harlem** Bushwick** Inwood** Hamilton Heights** Bedstuy** East Harlem** Upper East Side** Williamsburg** Manhattanville** Central Park** Central Park North**Harlem** Upper West Side*</h3><hr>    </section>

<h2>* Bedstuy** Morningside Heights** Williamsburg** Bushwick** West Harlem** Morningside** Central Harlem** Inwood** Upper East Side**Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Manhattanville** Upper West Side** Central Park** East Harlem** Central Park North** Washington Heights*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Bedstuy** Morningside Heights** Williamsburg** Bushwick** West Harlem** Morningside** Central Harlem** Inwood** Upper East Side**Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Manhattanville** Upper West Side** Central Park** East Harlem** Central Park North** Washington Heights*</h2><hr>    </section>

<h1>* Bushwick** Williamsburg**Harlem** Washington Heights** Central Park North** East Harlem** Inwood** Morningside Heights** Morningside** Hamilton Heights** West Harlem** Bedstuy** Manhattanville** Central Harlem** Upper West Side** Upper East Side** Central Park*</h1><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h1>* Bushwick** Williamsburg**Harlem** Washington Heights** Central Park North** East Harlem** Inwood** Morningside Heights** Morningside** Hamilton Heights** West Harlem** Bedstuy** Manhattanville** Central Harlem** Upper West Side** Upper East Side** Central Park*</h1><hr>    </section>

<section class="userbody">
    

<figure class="iw multiimage">
    <div class="gallery">
        <span class="slider-back arrow">&lt;</span>

        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">

<h3>* Central Park North** Morningside** Washington Heights** East Harlem** Central Harlem** Upper East Side** Williamsburg** Hamilton Heights** Central Park** Bedstuy** West Harlem** Inwood** Morningside Heights** Bushwick** Manhattanville** Upper West Side**Harlem*</h3><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h3>* Central Park North** Morningside** Washington Heights** East Harlem** Central Harlem** Upper East Side** Williamsburg** Hamilton Heights** Central Park** Bedstuy** West Harlem** Inwood** Morningside Heights** Bushwick** Manhattanville** Upper West Side**Harlem*</h3><hr>    </section>

<h3>* Upper East Side** Central Park North** Inwood** Bedstuy** Central Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Williamsburg** Upper West Side** Bushwick** Manhattanville** East Harlem** Morningside Heights** West Harlem** Washington Heights** Morningside** Central Park**Harlem*</h3><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
3 bedrooms total <br>
<br>
1x$1050<br>
1x$1100<br>
1x$1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h3>* Upper East Side** Central Park North** Inwood** Bedstuy** Central Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Williamsburg** Upper West Side** Bushwick** Manhattanville** East Harlem** Morningside Heights** West Harlem** Washington Heights** Morningside** Central Park**Harlem*</h3><hr>    </section>

<h2>*Harlem** Morningside Heights** East Harlem** Hamilton Heights** West Harlem** Washington Heights** Manhattanville** Upper West Side** Morningside** Bushwick** Upper East Side** Inwood** Central Park** Williamsburg** Central Harlem** Central Park North** Bedstuy*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
3 bedrooms total <br>
<br>
1 x $1050<br>
1 x $1100<br>
1 x $1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>*Harlem** Morningside Heights** East Harlem** Hamilton Heights** West Harlem** Washington Heights** Manhattanville** Upper West Side** Morningside** Bushwick** Upper East Side** Inwood** Central Park** Williamsburg** Central Harlem** Central Park North** Bedstuy*</h2><hr>    </section>

<h2>* Upper East Side** Williamsburg** Manhattanville** Central Park North** Washington Heights**Harlem** West Harlem** Inwood** Central Park** Morningside** Central Harlem** East Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Morningside Heights** Upper West Side** Bedstuy** Bushwick*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
3 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Upper East Side** Williamsburg** Manhattanville** Central Park North** Washington Heights**Harlem** West Harlem** Inwood** Central Park** Morningside** Central Harlem** East Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Morningside Heights** Upper West Side** Bedstuy** Bushwick*</h2><hr>    </section>

<h2>* Central Park** East Harlem** West Harlem** Williamsburg** Central Harlem** Central Park North** Morningside** Washington Heights** Morningside Heights** Upper West Side** Hamilton Heights** Inwood** Upper East Side** Manhattanville** Bushwick**Harlem** Bedstuy*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Central Park** East Harlem** West Harlem** Williamsburg** Central Harlem** Central Park North** Morningside** Washington Heights** Morningside Heights** Upper West Side** Hamilton Heights** Inwood** Upper East Side** Manhattanville** Bushwick**Harlem** Bedstuy*</h2><hr>    </section>

<h3>* Bedstuy** Williamsburg** Upper West Side** Upper East Side** Central Park North** Hamilton Heights** Central Harlem** East Harlem** West Harlem** Bushwick**Harlem** Central Park** Morningside** Washington Heights** Manhattanville** Morningside Heights** Inwood*</h3><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h3>* Bedstuy** Williamsburg** Upper West Side** Upper East Side** Central Park North** Hamilton Heights** Central Harlem** East Harlem** West Harlem** Bushwick**Harlem** Central Park** Morningside** Washington Heights** Manhattanville** Morningside Heights** Inwood*</h3><hr>    </section>

<h1>* East Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Manhattanville** Upper West Side** Bedstuy** Bushwick** Washington Heights**Harlem** Central Park North** Morningside** Williamsburg** Upper East Side** West Harlem** Central Harlem** Morningside Heights** Inwood** Central Park*</h1><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
3 bedrooms total <br>
<br>
1x$1050<br>
1x$1100<br>
1x$1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h1>* East Harlem** Hamilton Heights** Manhattanville** Upper West Side** Bedstuy** Bushwick** Washington Heights**Harlem** Central Park North** Morningside** Williamsburg** Upper East Side** West Harlem** Central Harlem** Morningside Heights** Inwood** Central Park*</h1><hr>    </section>

</h2>

<h2>* Central Park North** Hamilton Heights** Bedstuy** Inwood** Bushwick** Upper West Side** Central Harlem** Washington Heights** Manhattanville** Upper East Side** Morningside** Williamsburg** Central Park** East Harlem** West Harlem**Harlem** Morningside Heights*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Central Park North** Hamilton Heights** Bedstuy** Inwood** Bushwick** Upper West Side** Central Harlem** Washington Heights** Manhattanville** Upper East Side** Morningside** Williamsburg** Central Park** East Harlem** West Harlem**Harlem** Morningside Heights*</h2><hr>    </section>

<h2>* Bushwick** Central Park North** Upper East Side** Hamilton Heights**Harlem** Upper West Side** Central Park** Bedstuy** Washington Heights** Morningside Heights** Williamsburg** Morningside** Inwood** Central Harlem** East Harlem** Manhattanville** West Harlem*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
3 bedrooms total <br>
<br>
1 x $1050<br>
1 x $1100<br>
1 x $1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Bushwick** Central Park North** Upper East Side** Hamilton Heights**Harlem** Upper West Side** Central Park** Bedstuy** Washington Heights** Morningside Heights** Williamsburg** Morningside** Inwood** Central Harlem** East Harlem** Manhattanville** West Harlem*</h2><hr>    </section>

<ul class="notices">

<h3>* Upper East Side** Morningside** Hamilton Heights** Central Harlem**Harlem** Upper West Side** Morningside Heights** Washington Heights** West Harlem** Williamsburg** Manhattanville** Bushwick** East Harlem** Central Park North** Bedstuy** Inwood** Central Park*</h3><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
3 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h3>* Upper East Side** Morningside** Hamilton Heights** Central Harlem**Harlem** Upper West Side** Morningside Heights** Washington Heights** West Harlem** Williamsburg** Manhattanville** Bushwick** East Harlem** Central Park North** Bedstuy** Inwood** Central Park*</h3><hr>    </section>

        </div>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/wch/roo/6110485528.html"></div>
        </div>
Looking for a roommate to share this spacious 2 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment in White Plains. You'll get a big bedroom to yourself, big common living room and kitchen, great neighborhood, utilities included in rent (besides TV/Cable), parking included, small patio + office space, huge private closet.  Building has a no pets allowed policy. Move in date July 1st, contact me if you're interested and introduce yourself a little, thanks.    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

<h1>* Central Park North** Bushwick** Upper East Side** Upper West Side** Central Park** Inwood** Williamsburg** East Harlem**Harlem** Manhattanville** Morningside Heights** Morningside** Central Harlem** West Harlem** Washington Heights** Bedstuy** Hamilton Heights*</h1><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1000<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h1>* Central Park North** Bushwick** Upper East Side** Upper West Side** Central Park** Inwood** Williamsburg** East Harlem**Harlem** Manhattanville** Morningside Heights** Morningside** Central Harlem** West Harlem** Washington Heights** Bedstuy** Hamilton Heights*</h1><hr>    </section>

<h2>* Morningside** Central Harlem** Central Park North** Morningside Heights** Inwood** Central Park** East Harlem** West Harlem** Upper West Side** Manhattanville** Williamsburg** Bedstuy** Bushwick**Harlem** Upper East Side** Washington Heights** Hamilton Heights*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1000<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Morningside** Central Harlem** Central Park North** Morningside Heights** Inwood** Central Park** East Harlem** West Harlem** Upper West Side** Manhattanville** Williamsburg** Bedstuy** Bushwick**Harlem** Upper East Side** Washington Heights** Hamilton Heights*</h2><hr>    </section>

<h2>* Morningside** Morningside Heights** Bedstuy** Washington Heights** Upper West Side** Hamilton Heights** Upper East Side**Harlem** East Harlem** West Harlem** Inwood** Central Park North** Williamsburg** Bushwick** Central Harlem** Manhattanville** Central Park*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1000<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Morningside** Morningside Heights** Bedstuy** Washington Heights** Upper West Side** Hamilton Heights** Upper East Side**Harlem** East Harlem** West Harlem** Inwood** Central Park North** Williamsburg** Bushwick** Central Harlem** Manhattanville** Central Park*</h2><hr>    </section>

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">
   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-06-01" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available jun 1</span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">
           <span>no smoking</span><br>
           <span>carport</span><br>
           <span>private bath</span><br>
           <span>private room</span><br>
           <span>wheelchair accessible</span><br>
   </p>
    </div>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/brk/roo/6110516898.html"></div>
        </div>
Hello! We are two working twenty-somethings looking for a third roommate in our 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment in Bushwick. <br>
<br>
Your room, the master bedroom, has a private bathroom, closet, and access to the furnished private backyard (includes outdoor furniture and grill)! There are also two additional closets in the apartment for storage as well. The kitchen was renovated about a year ago and includes modern appliances, a granite counter top, and a stainless steel refrigerator. There is also a private parking spot (no need to worry about street parking and moving your car!), which you can use for no additional charge. <br>
<br>
The apartment is on the ground floor, so no need to worry about stairs. <br>
<br>
The nearest trains are the L (4 minute walk, Wilson Avenue stop) and the J (6 minute walk, Chauncey Street stop). There is also a bus stop across the street. The quiet neighborhood has numerous bodegas, restaurants, and stores in the area. <br>
<br>
To move in you would need first month's rent ($1100) plus a security deposit ($1100) for a total of $2200. Internet is $15 per person, and bills (Con Ed and National Grid), typically run between $30-$50 per person each month. <br>
<br>
Our ideal roommate is easy-going, kind, considerate, responsible, self-aware, clean, and honest. Students or professionals are OK. Long term or short term rental is OK. <br>
<br>
If interested, please feel free to send me an email. Tell me a little bit about yourself, let me know when you may be free to stop by, and ask any questions you may have.<br>
<br>
Sorry, no couples, smokers, pets, or children.    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

<h2>* West Harlem** Manhattanville** Hamilton Heights** East Harlem**Harlem** Washington Heights** Central Park** Central Harlem** Bushwick** Morningside Heights** Inwood** Central Park North** Bedstuy** Upper East Side** Upper West Side** Morningside** Williamsburg*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* West Harlem** Manhattanville** Hamilton Heights** East Harlem**Harlem** Washington Heights** Central Park** Central Harlem** Bushwick** Morningside Heights** Inwood** Central Park North** Bedstuy** Upper East Side** Upper West Side** Morningside** Williamsburg*</h2><hr>    </section>

<h1>* Upper East Side** Morningside** Upper West Side** Morningside Heights** Central Park North** Inwood** Central Park** Hamilton Heights** Central Harlem** Washington Heights**Harlem** East Harlem** Bedstuy** Manhattanville** Bushwick** West Harlem** Williamsburg*</h1><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h1>* Upper East Side** Morningside** Upper West Side** Morningside Heights** Central Park North** Inwood** Central Park** Hamilton Heights** Central Harlem** Washington Heights**Harlem** East Harlem** Bedstuy** Manhattanville** Bushwick** West Harlem** Williamsburg*</h1><hr>    </section>

   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span><b>1BR</b> / <b>1Ba</b></span>
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-06-01" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available jun 1</span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">
                 <b>open house dates</b>
                 <br>
                   <span class="otherpostings">

                 <br>

                 <br>
                   <span class="otherpostings">

                   </span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">
           <span>furnished</span><br>
           <span>apartment</span><br>
           <span>no smoking</span><br>
           <span>carport</span><br>
           <span>private bath</span><br>
           <span>private room</span><br>
   </p>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/brk/sub/6110524443.html"></div>
        </div>
Hello! We are two working twenty-somethings looking for a third roommate in our 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment in Bushwick. <br>
<br>
Your room, the master bedroom, has a private bathroom, closet, and access to the furnished private backyard (includes outdoor furniture and grill)! There are also two additional closets in the apartment for storage as well. The kitchen was renovated about a year ago and includes modern appliances, a granite counter top, and a stainless steel refrigerator. There is also a private parking spot (no need to worry about street parking and moving your car!), which you can use for no additional charge. <br>
<br>
The apartment is on the ground floor, so no need to worry about stairs. <br>
<br>
The nearest trains are the L (4 minute walk, Wilson Avenue stop) and the J (6 minute walk, Chauncey Street stop). There is also a bus stop across the street. The quiet neighborhood has numerous bodegas, restaurants, and stores in the area. <br>
<br>
To move in you would need first month's rent ($1100) plus a security deposit ($1100) for a total of $2200. Internet is $15 per person, and bills (Con Ed and National Grid), typically run between $30-$50 per person each month. <br>
<br>
Our ideal roommate is easy-going, kind, considerate, responsible, self-aware, clean, and honest. Students or professionals are OK. Long term or short term rental is OK. <br>
<br>
If interested, please feel free to send me an email. Tell me a little bit about yourself, let me know when you may be free to stop by, and ask any questions you may have.<br>
<br>
Sorry, no couples, smokers, pets, or children.    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

<h2 class="postingtitle">
    <span class="icon icon-star" role="button">
        <span class="screen-reader-text">favorite this post</span>

    <span class="postingtitletext">
<span class="price">$1050</span> <span id="titletextonly">Great 3 bed apartment with lots of light in rooms and exposed brick and free mon</span><small> (Harlem)</small>        <span class="js-only banish-unbanish">

<section class="userbody">

<h2>* Central Harlem** Central Park North** Central Park** Upper West Side** Washington Heights** Manhattanville** Morningside Heights** East Harlem** Bushwick** Inwood** Morningside** Hamilton Heights** Bedstuy** Upper East Side** West Harlem** Williamsburg**Harlem*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
3 bedrooms total <br>
<br>
1x$1050<br>
1x$1100<br>
1x$1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Central Harlem** Central Park North** Central Park** Upper West Side** Washington Heights** Manhattanville** Morningside Heights** East Harlem** Bushwick** Inwood** Morningside** Hamilton Heights** Bedstuy** Upper East Side** West Harlem** Williamsburg**Harlem*</h2><hr>    </section>

<h3>* East Harlem** Morningside** West Harlem** Manhattanville** Bushwick** Central Harlem** Hamilton Heights**Harlem** Morningside Heights** Inwood** Washington Heights** Upper West Side** Central Park North** Central Park** Williamsburg** Upper East Side** Bedstuy*</h3><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
4 bedrooms total<br>
2 x 1075<br>
2 x 1025<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h3>* East Harlem** Morningside** West Harlem** Manhattanville** Bushwick** Central Harlem** Hamilton Heights**Harlem** Morningside Heights** Inwood** Washington Heights** Upper West Side** Central Park North** Central Park** Williamsburg** Upper East Side** Bedstuy*</h3><hr>    </section>

<h1>* Morningside Heights** Central Park** Washington Heights** West Harlem** Upper East Side** Central Park North** Manhattanville** Inwood**Harlem** Williamsburg** Bedstuy** Hamilton Heights** Bushwick** Upper West Side** Central Harlem** Morningside** East Harlem*</h1><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
3 bedrooms total <br>
<br>
1 x $1050<br>
1 x $1100<br>
1 x $1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h1>* Morningside Heights** Central Park** Washington Heights** West Harlem** Upper East Side** Central Park North** Manhattanville** Inwood**Harlem** Williamsburg** Bedstuy** Hamilton Heights** Bushwick** Upper West Side** Central Harlem** Morningside** East Harlem*</h1><hr>    </section>

<h2>* Morningside** Upper West Side** Inwood** Morningside Heights**Harlem** Washington Heights** Bushwick** Central Park** Upper East Side** West Harlem** East Harlem** Central Harlem** Bedstuy** Hamilton Heights** Manhattanville** Williamsburg** Central Park North*</h2><hr>PLEASE READ EVERYTHING BEFORE CONTACTING TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. <br>
<br>
This is an absolutely gorgeous apartment with exposed brick everywhere, a washer and dryer in the apartment, lots of light, closet space, large living room, 2 new bathrooms and new kitchen.  You couldn?t be closer to the AC/BD express train at 127th!!  Close to lots of restaurants, bars and you can literally be in midtown in 12 minutes from your door and you are on a quiet street too.  <br>
<br>
3 bedrooms total<br>
1 x 1050<br>
1 x 1100<br>
1 x 1150<br>
<br>
1 FREE MONTH!<br>
<br>
You will be on a 12 MONTH lease WITH your roommates and you will need to be approved like you would any apartment lease, be ready to provide a tax return, pay stubs, bank statement, ID etc. <br>
<br>
To move in you will need <br>
-1st month <br>
-Security Deposit (1 month) <br>
-Brokers fee of 1 month<br>
<br>
All applicants must earn 40X the rent (about 41k min) and credit minimum of 650. Guarantors OK too. (guarantors need to earn 80x rent and credit 650 or higher) <br>
<br>
If you need the stability of a 12 month lease and need affordable rent than this could be a great fit for you. Conveniently located close to the trains you are in one of the best area?s of Manhattan.  <hr><h2>* Morningside** Upper West Side** Inwood** Morningside Heights**Harlem** Washington Heights** Bushwick** Central Park** Upper East Side** West Harlem** East Harlem** Central Harlem** Bedstuy** Hamilton Heights** Manhattanville** Williamsburg** Central Park North*</h2><hr>    </section>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/que/sub/6110887937.html"></div>
        </div>
June and July I sublet a room just for 2 months . One furnished and cozy private room for rent in great apartment.the apartment is located in a very quiet neighborhood in Long Island city/Astoria 39 ave is the train station (N and W train) only 10 min you are in the city . The R M E F 7  trains are also available by walking distance.   NO PETS NO SMOKING NO DRUGS NO PARTY are ALLOWED IN THE HOUSE.all the bill is inclusive at the rent price ,electricity, gas ,water, housekeeping, internet. No couple. <br>
 <a href="/fb/nyc/sub/6110887937" class="showcontact" title="click to show contact info" rel="nofollow">show contact info</a><br>
silvia thank you so much ;)    </section>

        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">

            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/mnh/roo/6110892090.html"></div>
        </div>
3 minute walk to "C" train station and "C Town" super market. Recently renovated Apt building is quiet and located on St. Nicholas Ave & 159th St. <br>
<br>
High speed wireless internet connection. <br>
I have a small friendly dog.<br>
Unit is on 2nd floor on walk up building.<br>
Wash/Dryer machines in the basement.<br>
Room is small but clean and quiet.<br>
<br>
Available to move in June 1st. $725/Month. Plus utilities (about $75/month) And one month security deposit.<br>
Please don't forget your phone number and what you do for a living, and how long you are planning to stay.    </section>

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">
   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span><b>1BR</b> / <b>sharedBa</b></span>
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-06-01" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available jun 1</span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">
           <span>apartment</span><br>
           <span>no private bath</span><br>
           <span>private room</span><br>
   </p>
    </div>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/mnh/sub/6111202050.html"></div>
        </div>
I'm subletting my room in our 3 bedroom Lower East Side apartment from June 3rd to July 28th. The room features a full size bed, dresser, nightstand, clothing rack and a tv. We're neighbors with Lucky Bee, Barrio Chino and Dudley's which is great and Essex Market and the J/F/M subway is just a minute away. You'd be sharing the apartment with my two female roommates, who both work in fashion and are amazing! The rent is $1450 for June 3-31 and $1450 for July 1-28, and I'm looking for someone willing to rent for the whole period! Move in date is negotiable, but move out date is set! Utilities included.    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/brk/roo/6111286339.html"></div>
        </div>
Large bedroom with large closet available for sublet in 2 bedroom/1 bath apartment - $1,000 per month - 4th floor of a walk up building - laundry on site - pets negotiable. Located in Midwood, Brooklyn - 8 minute walk from the B/Q Kings Highway express stop. Available starting June 1 for short or long term sublet (with possible early move in).<br>
<br>
Roomate is a female in her 20's, law student. <br>
<br>
Please call if you're interested! 
 <a href="/fb/nyc/roo/6111286339" class="showcontact" title="click to show contact info" rel="nofollow">show contact info</a>

    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0]; // dangerous assumption
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if ( fmt === 'regular' || fmt === 'mobile' ) {
            pagemode = fmt;
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
        } else {
            pagemode = 'regular';
        }
        pagemode = pagemode === 'mobile' ? 'mobile' : 'desktop';
        bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        if (C('hidesearch') === '1' && pagemode !== 'mobile') {
            bodyClassList.push('hide-search');
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof window.sectionBase !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(window.sectionBase + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1] || window.defaultView;
            if (mode) {
                bodyClassList.push(mode);
            }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">
   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span><b>1BR</b> / <b>1Ba</b></span>
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-05-31" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available may 31</span>
            <br>
           <span>listed by: <b>Stephanie Browne</b></span><br>
   </p>

           <span>apartment</span><br>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/mnh/fee/6111325920.html"></div>
        </div>
Hello Craigslisters.<br>
<br>
I have a beautiful furnished flex 3-bedroom loft in Bushwick that I want to up and move my furniture and my life into Manhattan. I would love to share a two bedroom with another nice individual, each of us to pay $1200-1500. I would also be open to getting a three bedroom and "hosting" in the third bedroom to offset our rent costs.<br>
<br>
I am a creative lady, an art curator and interior stylist. I have spent the last year in Berlin curating, learning, German, and overall, expanding my horizons. I am returning to NYC since my lease is up on my Bushwick space and it feels like the right time to rejoin my New York community. I'm friendly, clean, hard working, responsible. I have an active social life, but at 32, am no longer in the crazy party phase. I currently work with clients over Skype, however, I am lining up interviews for full and part time arts management positions.<br>
<br>
I have started contacting agents and will be back in NY to look in person at spaces May 16. The missing part of the equation is YOU, another qualified applicant, making 60K or more to help us get approved for a two bedroom with rent amount up to 3K. You are kind, responsible, and open minded. Everything else about you makes you uniquely you. I want to learn more! Please send a hello.<br>
<br>
These photos are of my current space.<br>
<br>
    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
        <li>Fee Disclosure:Application Fee</li>
</ul>

               </p>

<body class="posting en">
<script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0]; // dangerous assumption
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if ( fmt === 'regular' || fmt === 'mobile' ) {
            pagemode = fmt;
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
        } else {
            pagemode = 'regular';
        }
        pagemode = pagemode === 'mobile' ? 'mobile' : 'desktop';
        bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        if (C('hidesearch') === '1' && pagemode !== 'mobile') {
            bodyClassList.push('hide-search');
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof window.sectionBase !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(window.sectionBase + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1] || window.defaultView;
            if (mode) {
                bodyClassList.push(mode);
            }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

<h2 class="postingtitle">
    <span class="icon icon-star" role="button">
        <span class="screen-reader-text">favorite this post</span>
    </span>
    <span class="postingtitletext">
<span class="price">$750</span> <span id="titletextonly">One room available for 750 must be fulltime working professional male</span>        <span class="js-only banish-unbanish">
  <span class="banish" role="button">
    <span class="icon icon-trash" aria-hidden="true"></span>

</h2>
<section class="userbody">
    

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">
   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-04-30" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available apr 30</span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">
           <span>no private bath</span><br>
           <span>private room</span><br>
   </p>
    </div>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/wch/roo/6111280709.html"></div>
        </div>
I have a room available for 750 a month in a brand new renovated apartment. Located westside of Yonkers by the river 3 blocks away from metro north train station and DMV. Cable ready Wi-Fi free. Must be fulltime working professional male only. Please be drug free smoke free and busy on the go professional. Call for more details or pictures. Will not respond to emails or text. Must call first.    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0]; // dangerous assumption
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if ( fmt === 'regular' || fmt === 'mobile' ) {
            pagemode = fmt;
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
        } else {
            pagemode = 'regular';
        }
        pagemode = pagemode === 'mobile' ? 'mobile' : 'desktop';
        bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        if (C('hidesearch') === '1' && pagemode !== 'mobile') {
            bodyClassList.push('hide-search');
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof window.sectionBase !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(window.sectionBase + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1] || window.defaultView;
            if (mode) {
                bodyClassList.push(mode);
            }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());

<body class="posting en">
<script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0]; // dangerous assumption
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if ( fmt === 'regular' || fmt === 'mobile' ) {
            pagemode = fmt;
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
        } else {
            pagemode = 'regular';
        }
        pagemode = pagemode === 'mobile' ? 'mobile' : 'desktop';
        bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        if (C('hidesearch') === '1' && pagemode !== 'mobile') {
            bodyClassList.push('hide-search');
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof window.sectionBase !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(window.sectionBase + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1] || window.defaultView;
            if (mode) {
                bodyClassList.push(mode);
            }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/que/roo/6111297021.html"></div>
        </div>
I have a nice furnished bedroom in private house located in Woodside, Queens. The room has closet space, frame and mattress for full size bed. For a single person ONLY. Large stainless steal kitchen, clean spacious bathroom. Utilities are included and the bedroom has free-wifi. 4 roommates (3 male,1 female) .The room is available now or May1st.<br>
<br>
Call me to schedule for an appointment.<br>

 <a href="/fb/nyc/roo/6111297021" class="showcontact" title="click to show contact info" rel="nofollow">show contact info</a>

<script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0]; // dangerous assumption
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if ( fmt === 'regular' || fmt === 'mobile' ) {
            pagemode = fmt;
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
        } else {
            pagemode = 'regular';
        }
        pagemode = pagemode === 'mobile' ? 'mobile' : 'desktop';
        bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        if (C('hidesearch') === '1' && pagemode !== 'mobile') {
            bodyClassList.push('hide-search');
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof window.sectionBase !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(window.sectionBase + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1] || window.defaultView;
            if (mode) {
                bodyClassList.push(mode);
            }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

ONLY INQUIRIES SENT TO THE ADDRESS BELOW WILL GET A REPLY<br>
cont:. . . beneddy054(@)gmail(.)com<br>
<br>
The larger of 2 sitting on the west side of the building through the king size bedroom. The night views are spectacular overseeing Manhattan and its beautiful lighting. The 2nd terrace is on the east end of the home offering Astoria views and access to your living area. Constructed in 2014. This 13 unit boutique condominium offers just one extraordinary penthouse residence with 2 private terraces accumulating 1500 square feet. Featuring white oak flooring throughout the entire residence. The kitchen is a with island counter topped with Caesar stone counters and glassed back splash. Stainless steel appliances include 32 inch refrigerator, 30 inch gas range stove, microwave, and dishwasher.<br>
Located 1 block from the lively 30th Avenue cafes, bars, and restaurants. Shopping, groceries, and more are all at your footstep. Washer/dryer is en-suite .196 Kent St, greenpoint Brooklyn NY 11222    </section>

    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0]; // dangerous assumption
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if ( fmt === 'regular' || fmt === 'mobile' ) {
            pagemode = fmt;
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
        } else {
            pagemode = 'regular';
        }
        pagemode = pagemode === 'mobile' ? 'mobile' : 'desktop';
        bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        if (C('hidesearch') === '1' && pagemode !== 'mobile') {
            bodyClassList.push('hide-search');

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">
   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-05-15" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available may 15</span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">
           <span>no laundry on site</span><br>
           <span>no smoking</span><br>
           <span>street parking</span><br>
           <span>no private bath</span><br>
           <span>private room</span><br>
   </p>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/brk/roo/6111363376.html"></div>
        </div>
Looking for a beautiful room in Carroll Gardens? This is it! I'm looking for someone to take over my room starting 5/15 or 6/1. It's a big room in a 3 bed apartment and only 3 blocks from Carroll Street F/G stop!<br>
<br>
You would be sharing this big apartment with two lovely ladies. It is about 1100 square feet and the room for rent is at the back of the apartment. It's on the third floor and the landlord is currently building a garden out front! The room gets A TON of natural light. It also has a super cute faux fireplace.<br>
<br>
I've lived here for 3 years and am sad to leave but I hope whoever takes over loves it as much as I did!<br>
<br>
FAQs:<br>
<br>
Date avail: 5/15 or 6/1<br>
<br>
Lease: month-to-month, can be short or long term. Please specify what you're looking for.<br>
<br>
Rent: $1200 plus utilities, which run around 30-50/person/month (only on higher end during summer)<br>
<br>
Text or email me to schedule viewing!<br>
<br>
PS: I am also selling the furniture in the room if you need furniture.    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

<script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0]; // dangerous assumption
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if ( fmt === 'regular' || fmt === 'mobile' ) {
            pagemode = fmt;
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
        } else {
            pagemode = 'regular';
        }
        pagemode = pagemode === 'mobile' ? 'mobile' : 'desktop';
        bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        if (C('hidesearch') === '1' && pagemode !== 'mobile') {
            bodyClassList.push('hide-search');
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof window.sectionBase !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(window.sectionBase + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1] || window.defaultView;
            if (mode) {
                bodyClassList.push(mode);
            }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>
