<script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0]; // dangerous assumption
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if ( fmt === 'regular' || fmt === 'mobile' ) {
            pagemode = fmt;
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
        } else {
            pagemode = 'regular';
        }
        pagemode = pagemode === 'mobile' ? 'mobile' : 'desktop';
        bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        if (C('hidesearch') === '1' && pagemode !== 'mobile') {
            bodyClassList.push('hide-search');
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof window.sectionBase !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(window.sectionBase + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1] || window.defaultView;
            if (mode) {
                bodyClassList.push(mode);
            }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">
   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span><b>2BR</b> / <b>1Ba</b></span>
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-06-01" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available jun 1</span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">
           <span>apartment</span><br>
           <span>no laundry on site</span><br>
           <span>no parking</span><br>
           <span>private bath</span><br>
           <span>private room</span><br>
   </p>
    </div>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/brk/sub/6111472131.html"></div>
        </div>
I'm moving out of my room in this 2 BR in Greenpoint near McGolrick Park. The apartment is a third floor walk-up and is railroad-style, with high ceilings, original moldings, built-in shelves, good plumbing and heat, working appliances and other details. The apartment is about 10 blocks from the G train and a 20 minute walk to the L. The B48 bus stops across the street, and a B24 bus stop is one block away. There are several grocery stores and laundromats within a couple of blocks. This is a nice little pocket of Greenpoint that's very relaxed, quiet and convenient.<br>
<br>
The room is for the middle room in a railroad, and measures about 13x8 feet. There are built-in drawers and shelves (the shelves are the perfect size for records), and a very large and deep closet. There are no windows, but there's a glass panel above the door between rooms and the room gets a decent amount of natural light. Rent is $981.21 a month, and utilities (electric, gas, cable) average $70-80 a month. The security deposit is one month's rent. The sublet is either for June 1 through August 31, with the lease up for re-signing September 1. People who are willing to re-sign the lease, and/or confirm a move-in date before May 1, will get preference.<br>
<br>
About my roommate: Guy, 30, works at a Greenpoint-based startup. He's lived in this apartment for almost five years and intends to stay on for the foreseeable future. No pets, but likes dogs and can tolerate a cat (cats have to be cleared with the landlord). Looking for someone who's responsible, relaxed, able to pay rent and utilities on time, and reasonably clean. Non-smokers preferred. Has friends stay over occasionally, and is accommodating if you have friends who want to stay over (within reason). If you're interested, please email me and tell me a little about yourself.<br>
<br>
Local Transportation: L and G trains, B48 and B24 buses    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/brk/roo/6111517833.html"></div>
        </div>
This post is for a downstairs room in a large 3 Bdrm 1st Floor/Basement apt. Located off the Lorimer stop of the J, M and L. The place is spacious, quiet, and there's cat. We also have walk up roof access. In addition to being big, it's very convenient, which is why I have been here for 10 years. Love the neighborhood too, very close to a lot of bars and restaurants on Grand, but it's also a quiet block.<br>
Non smokers preferred, since it's a no smoking apartment.<br>
All 3 BR's are 11'x22' w/ window(though not much of a view), unfurnished. Fully furnished K&B, w/Large common area. Utilities (g&e, heat/water, hi-speed net,<br>
cable TV(HBO, Showtime, Cinemax, cable box in the room if wanted). All is included in the $1200/mo rent. Security is required before move in, also $1200. Currently 2 professional males, both with day schedules. Will ask to provide references.<br>
Seeking someone cool, laid back and clean(clean up after yourself, put everything away, etc.)for possible long term, starting June 1st. No dogs, but would consider someone with no more than one cat.<br>
Thanks    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/wch/roo/6111488378.html"></div>
        </div>
Looking for a roommate to share this spacious 2 bedroom 1 bathroom apartment in White Plains. You'll get a big bedroom to yourself, big common living room and kitchen, great neighborhood, utilities included in rent (besides TV/Cable), parking included, small patio + office space, huge private closet. Building has a no pets allowed policy. Move in date July 1st, contact me if you're interested and introduce yourself a little, thanks.    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

<div class="avoid-scams">

    Please flag
    <a href="https://www.craigslist.org/about/FHA">discriminatory housing ads</a>

    <em>DO NOT wire funds (e.g. Western Union)</em>, or buy/rent sight unseen

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">
   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-06-01" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available jun 1</span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">
           <span>laundry in bldg</span><br>
           <span>no smoking</span><br>
           <span>attached garage</span><br>
           <span>no private bath</span><br>
           <span>private room</span><br>
   </p>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/mnh/roo/6111639343.html"></div>
        </div>
We are looking for a third female roommate to share our big, clean apartment. We want someone who is mature, clean, respectful and friendly. No pets, no drama, no drugs, no smokers, and party free! Must have good credit and a reliable job (working professionals or graduate students only).<br>
<br>
Our apartment is located in Harlem off the 2/3 subway line, 2 blocks from the B/C line, and a 10 minute walk to the 6 line. This is a luxury doorman building with grocery store and CVS close by. We are also only a few blocks away from Central Park! There is a laundry room in the building and also a courtyard for residents use only. Paid monthly parking is available in the building's garage.<br>
<br>
The room can fit a queen size bed, dresser and more, has two large closets, and gets lot of sunlight. You would share a bathroom with one other roommate. We all share the living room/dining room and kitchen.<br>
<br>
The room is available on June 1st and the rent is $1,100 a month (not including utilities which we split between the 3 of us). Heat is included. First month's rent and one month's security deposit due upon signing. Possibility to buy furniture if interested.    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0]; // dangerous assumption
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if ( fmt === 'regular' || fmt === 'mobile' ) {
            pagemode = fmt;
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';

            pagemode = 'regular';

        pagemode = pagemode === 'mobile' ? 'mobile' : 'desktop';
        bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        if (C('hidesearch') === '1' && pagemode !== 'mobile') {
            bodyClassList.push('hide-search');

        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }

                bodyClassList.push(mode);
            }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());

Studio size secluded private room 4 rent 4 INDIVIDUAL only. XXlarge, quiet, clean, private house in great neighborhood w/living room set and private bathroom. Additional door 2 backyard allows 4 personal patio area. $1050 incl everything. personal fridge &brkfst area bathrm w/parking, share W/D. avail. June 1st Wifi, deluxe cable package incl. Garage parking&Xtra storage avail. w/Xtra cost. Dog Ok depending on dog...No puppies, no cats! looking 4 a laid back, easy going person. NO DRUGS ALLOWED OR TOLERATED!!! NO REALTOR FEE. <br>
*** Respond with following answers questions Tell me about yourself (including occupation; history and why you are moving)    </section>

    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){

        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');

I'm a 27 year old female who is currently renting a wonderful 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment in Hamilton. My roommate is leaving in May when the lease ends, and I am looking for a new roommate to sign a new lease with me starting June 1st. The apartment has a washer and dryer, we each have our own bathroom, and we have a community pool. Very safe neighborhood and close to stores and restaurants. Please let me know as soon as possible. Looking for a roommate who is close in age.    </section>

<ul class="notices">

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">
   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-06-01" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available jun 1</span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">
           <span>no laundry on site</span><br>
           <span>street parking</span><br>
           <span>no private bath</span><br>
           <span>private room</span><br>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/que/roo/6111869981.html"></div>
        </div>
Hi! I am looking for someone to take my room in a 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom apartment in Astoria. The room is very large, with hardwood floors and a descent size closet. There's also a lot of closet space in the apartment! The apartment is furnished so you will only need to furnish the room<br>
<br>
My two roommates who will continue living here are females between 25 and 30. Both are working professionals who are extremely nice, clean, responsible, and easy going. I really like them and the place and am sad to be leaving.<br>
<br>
The apartment is centrally located between the Steinway St and Broadway subway stops, making it 5 minutes walking distance to the R, N, M and W trains (15 min from Manhattan). There are many restaurants, markets, coffee shops, gyms, etc nearby. <br>
<br>
This would be a lease takeover beginning June 1st for 6 months with the option to renew for an additional year in January. First, last, and security are needed upon signing the lease.<br>
<br>
Feel free to message me if you are interested and would like to hear more or come see the place. Thanks!    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/mnh/sub/6112438177.html"></div>
        </div>
Summer sublet<br>
JULY 1 - AUGUST 31 ONLY<br>
<br>
Exceptionally good deal for a great place in the West Village.<br>
One minute from NYU/Washington Square Park.<br>
One minute from two subway stations.<br>
Charming old studio apartment with skylight and view.<br>
Fully furnished. Cable/internet included.<br>
<br>
$1070.46/month<br>
Full two-month sublease only.<br>
No fees. I just want someone responsible I can trust.<br>
<br>
Full two months due upon signing of sublease plus $500 deposit for utilities (balance will be refunded).<br>
    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">
   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-06-01" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available jun 1</span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">
           <span>furnished</span><br>
           <span>w/d in unit</span><br>
           <span>street parking</span><br>
           <span>no private bath</span><br>
           <span>private room</span><br>
           <span>wheelchair accessible</span><br>
   </p>
    </div>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/brk/roo/6112467429.html"></div>
        </div>
I have a room for rent perfect for commuters or business travelers who need partial monthly lodging. <br>
<br>
The room is bright and airy and furnished with a brand new mid century modern twin bed and a dresser for your use. The apartment is on the 5th floor of an elevator building and features modern upscale decor, a washer and dryer, a large bathroom, original hardwood floors, a large living room with Apple TV, and is only one block from the F/G Church ave stop. The neighborhood is ideal, just a short walk to Prospect Park and lots of great restaurants, coffee shops, and bars nearby. <br>
<br>
I am a 33 year old male who is friendly, kind and respectful. I am open to any genders/identities and having lived primarily with women and/or queer folks in the past, am very aware and respectful in regards to space, communication, and boundaries. I own my apartment and live there with my very sweet dog who is a small boston terrier mix. I am not looking for full-time roommates but would love to share the space on a partial basis with someone who wants a regular place to stay when they are in town where they can keep some personal stuff and that feels a bit more like home rather than a hotel or Airbnb. The amount of time monthly is negotiable, as is price. <br>
<br>
Please don't hesitate to reach out with questions!    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">
   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span><b>2BR</b> / <b>2Ba</b></span>
             <span><b>1200</b>ft<sup>2</sup></span>
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-06-01" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available jun 1</span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">
           <span>cats are OK - purrr</span><br>
           <span>dogs are OK - wooof</span><br>
           <span>furnished</span><br>
           <span>apartment</span><br>
           <span>w/d in unit</span><br>
           <span>no smoking</span><br>
           <span>attached garage</span><br>
           <span>private bath</span><br>
           <span>private room</span><br>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/jsy/sub/6112488075.html"></div>
        </div>
Hey, everyone!<br>
<br>
My roommate is moving back home, so I'm looking to find someone to either sublet or take over half of my lease from June-October with a possibility of signing a new lease in October.<br>
<br>
It's an open concept 2 bedroom/2 bathroom apartment with laundry in unit, your own bathroom, and a full walk in closet. The room will be UNfurnished, but the living room will be furnished. It's $1300 a month.<br>
<br>
The apartment is located in Weehawken, NJ. <br>
Now, before you scoff! It's only 10 minutes by bus into the heart of Midtown. That is not an exaggeration! Google Map it! <br>
You get off at Port Authority and have access to almost every subway line. If you're a performer, it's only a four block walk to Pearl and Ripley-Grier! Which means you have plenty of time to go home after you wake up and sign up at 5:00 am for an audition!<br>
<br>
If you're interested in the apartment, contact me! Happy to answer any questions!    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html class="no-js">
<head>
<title>Looking for Roommate for Spacious 2BR/2Bath</title>
    	<link rel="canonical" href="http://longisland.craigslist.org/roo/6112705067.html">
	<meta name="description" content="Looking for a roommate to rent 1 bedroom with private bath of a 2 bedroom 1200sq ft apartment. The room for rent is a large (11'x11') bedroom with it's own walk in closet and full bathroom in a newly ">
	<meta name="robots" content="noarchive,nofollow,unavailable_after:Thursday, 15-Jun-17 14:41:58 EDT">
	<meta name="twitter:card" content="preview">
	<meta property="og:description" content="Looking for a roommate to rent 1 bedroom with private bath of a 2 bedroom 1200sq ft apartment. The room for rent is a large (11'x11') bedroom with it's own walk in closet and full bathroom in a newly ">

<script type="text/javascript"><!--
    function C(k){return(document.cookie.match('(^|; )'+k+'=([^;]*)')||0)[2]}
    var pagetype, pagemode;
    (function(){
        var h = document.documentElement;
        h.className = h.className.replace('no-js', 'js');
        var b = document.body;
        var bodyClassList = b.className.split(/\s+/);;
        pagetype = bodyClassList[0]; // dangerous assumption
        var fmt = C('cl_fmt');
        if ( fmt === 'regular' || fmt === 'mobile' ) {
            pagemode = fmt;
        } else if (screen.width <= 480) {
            pagemode = 'mobile';
        } else {
            pagemode = 'regular';
        }
        pagemode = pagemode === 'mobile' ? 'mobile' : 'desktop';
        bodyClassList.push(pagemode);
        if (C('hidesearch') === '1' && pagemode !== 'mobile') {
            bodyClassList.push('hide-search');
        }
        var width = window.innerWidth || document.documentElement.clientWidth;
        if (width > 1000) { bodyClassList.push('w1024'); }
        if (typeof window.sectionBase !== 'undefined') {
            var mode = (decodeURIComponent(C('cl_tocmode') || '').match(new RegExp(window.sectionBase + ':([^,]+)', 'i')) || {})[1] || window.defaultView;
            if (mode) {
                bodyClassList.push(mode);
            }
        }
        b.className = bodyClassList.join(' ');
    }());
--></script>

<h2 class="postingtitle">
    <span class="icon icon-star" role="button">
        <span class="screen-reader-text">favorite this post</span>
    </span>
    <span class="postingtitletext">
<span class="price">$1150</span> <span class="housing">/ 1200ft<sup>2</sup> - </span><span id="titletextonly">Looking for Roommate for Spacious 2BR/2Bath</span><small> (Coram, NY)</small>        <span class="js-only banish-unbanish">
  <span class="banish" role="button">

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">
   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span><b>1200</b>ft<sup>2</sup></span>
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-06-01" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available jun 1</span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">
           <span>w/d in unit</span><br>
           <span>detached garage</span><br>
           <span>private bath</span><br>
           <span>private room</span><br>
   </p>
    </div>

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//longisland.craigslist.org/roo/6112705067.html"></div>
        </div>
Looking for a roommate to rent 1 bedroom with private bath of a 2 bedroom 1200sq ft apartment.  The room for rent is a large (11'x11') bedroom with it's own walk in closet and full bathroom in a newly constructed apartment complex.  Room is available for move in on June 1.<br>
<br>
Our shared space includes a kitchen with brand new appliances (including dishwasher) and an island, large living room space, and patio.  There are plenty of closets and storage spaces available in the unit.  Washer and Dryer are also located in unit. The complex also includes a full access fitness center, pool, and grilling area a short walk away from the apartment.<br>
<br>
About me: I am a 26 year old male young professional working on long island, originally from upstate.  I stay busy during the week with work and enjoy time at the gym, organized sports, and unwinding with a book in my free time.  My long-term girlfriend will be sharing the room with me, she is also a young professional from upstate and easy going.  She also enjoys cooking and will often make more than enough food to share.  We're both neat, clean, and courteous.<br>
<br>
Security deposit is already covered. 1 month rent to move in, utilities will be shared each month.<br>
<br>
3 miles from Medford LIRR station<br>
7 miles to Port Jefferson<br>
8 miles (15 minutes) to Stony Brook Hospital<br>
<br>
Email me to set up a time to meet/view the apartment    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

    <div class="mapAndAttrs">
   <p class="attrgroup">
             <span><b>2BR</b> / <b>1Ba</b></span>
             <span class="housing_movein_now property_date" data-date="2017-06-01" 
                   data-today_msg="available now">available jun 1</span>
   </p>
   <p class="attrgroup">

    <section id="postingbody">
        <div class="print-information print-qrcode-container">
            <p class="print-qrcode-label">QR Code Link to This Post</p>
            <div class="print-qrcode" data-location="//newyork.craigslist.org/brk/sub/6112766852.html"></div>
        </div>
Large two-bedroom apartment with spacious, light-filled, and furnished living room, a medium-sized kitchen, and one bathroom. The available bedroom includes a full-sized bed, two closets, and a window AC unit. Roommates are quiet, clean, and friendly.<br>
<br>
One block away from the Beverly Road 2/5 train station. <br>
<br>
Rent is $895 a month, heat and hot water included. Available from June 1st through July 31st.    </section>

<ul class="notices">
            <li>do NOT contact me with unsolicited services or offers</li>
</ul>

Unfurnished one large room in private home. Private bathroom, kitchen area no stove/oven....bring your microwave, toaster oven, hot plate. Private off street parking, private entrance, private yard, enjoy your quiet peaceful BBQ . Rent is $ 900.00 Monthly and  $ 900.00 Security. Rent includes Hot Water,  <br>
Electric, and Heat you control your heat. NO SMOKING and NO PETS<br>
Available June 1st.<br>
E-mail  your full Name and Phone Number<br>
Place of work and how long you been working with company and last landlord with phone number<br>
Office will contact you    </section>
